nodes.text: Pira Ten was a human female who lived on Crucival. In 4 BBY, she was a part of the Opaline Creed and became close to a man named Hazram Namir, known as Umu Seven at the time. She and Namir survived the Creed's fall and stayed together until she died during the Battle of the Tower.
Pira Ten first appeared in the novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
